name: When It Hits
description:
Ivanne speedruns his grieving process and complains about his life after hearing about the world ending in twenty minutes. 

-

For O2A2 | very short

-

Making this in approximately a week because of procrastination gave me brain damage, apologies for any weird wordings or typos.  Character may or may not be lowkey based on a friend who doesn't know I made this VN ♪~ ᕕ(ᐛ)ᕗ .

Also I'm new to programming so if anything's weird, sorry bout that as well.  (*´д｀*)
